column4: hey - i've got a network problem - my wireless card is up on ra0 and I can ping things in a shell, but that's it - wget, firefox, gaim get stuck connecting to servers - any ideas?
do you need to login to the network? the wifi access at my school does that until you login
no - well, it's encrypted with wpa, but the connection comes up
then I have no idea, coz I haven't used WPA on linux ;d
